name: LinkedIn Longform (Articles & Newsletters)
primary_goal_vibe: Deep expertise, thought leadership, and long-form storytelling that goes beyond a single feed post.
tone_preference: Expert, structured, and reflective. Still practical and outcome-oriented, not academic.

copy_guidelines.copy_best_practices: The headline must carry a clear promise or topic. The introduction should quickly explain why the piece matters now and who it is for. Use subheadings, short sections, and examples. Close with a clear takeaway or action.
copy_guidelines.caption_structure_hint: Headline: clear and benefit-driven. Intro: 2–4 short paragraphs establishing problem, context, and relevance. Body: structured with subheadings and examples. Conclusion: summary plus next steps or questions.
copy_guidelines.recommended_caption_length: Medium to long, but broken into highly scannable sections.
cta_examples: Subscribe to the newsletter for future issues
Save this for your next planning session
Tell me which part you disagree with

article_structure_guidelines.primary_role: Deliver deeper context, frameworks, and case studies than a standard feed post.
best_practices: Use a clear structure: problem, insight, framework, examples, conclusion
Include concrete data points or cases where relevant
Use bullet points for lists and frameworks

hashtags_mentions.recommended_hashtags: 2–4 targeted hashtags at the end of the article or in its promotional post.
hashtags_mentions.hashtag_strategy: Use specific topic and industry hashtags, not broad generic ones.
hashtags_mentions.mention_strategy: Mention companies, tools, or people only when they are relevant to the story, not as reach hacks.

technical_constraints.title_max_length_recommendation: 60–80 characters for the headline for readability.
technical_constraints.formatting_note: Use headings, bold for emphasis, and bullet points to improve scanning on mobile.

required_elements: Intro that explains why this matters now
disallowed_practices: Clickbait titles that do not match content
Pure opinion with no structure or evidence
Huge text blocks without spacing or headings
